column4: hi, does anyone know how to get compiz to work with dual monitors? it works on my laptop, but when i plug in a secondary monitor compiz no longer works
you will not be able to use dual compiz on a laptop .. the graphics cards are underpowered \
i have an nvidia 9300, still too lightweight?
I have tried getting compiz working on 2 moniters - on a laptop .. and a desktop ... it works on the  desktop
